catch_line: RIGHT TURNS ON RED TRAFFIC CONTROL SIGNAL LIGHTS PROHIBITED.
full_text:
After authorized signs have been erected giving notice thereof, it shall be unlawful to proceed to turn right while facing a red traffic light at those locations specified in official Traffic Schedule No. 1, Electronic traffic control signals. 
Cross reference: Schedules incorporated by reference, §11-2004

dublin_core.Title: RIGHT TURNS ON RED TRAFFIC CONTROL SIGNAL LIGHTS PROHIBITED.

plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

RIGHT TURNS ON RED TRAFFIC CONTROL SIGNAL LIGHTS PROHIBITED. (§ 11-2105)

After authorized signs have been erected giving notice thereof, it shall be
unlawful to proceed to turn right while facing a red traffic light at those
locations specified in official Traffic Schedule No. 1, Electronic traffic
control signals. 
Cross reference: Schedules incorporated by reference, §11-2004
